Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Quilted, gently fitted, lightweight coat with a small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers.
Sun hat in braided paper straw with a band in a crêpe weave. Width of brim approx. 12 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with gently dropped shoulders, a decorative seam at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Dress in a patterned modal weave with a round neckline that has gathers at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Unlined.
